statements: SELECT * FROM audit_results WHERE bias_detected = TRUE;
SELECT ar_content_id, audit_date FROM audit_results WHERE auditor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT audit_id, bias_detected FROM audit_results WHERE audit_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM audit_results ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT auditor_id FROM audit_results WHERE ar_content_id = 'a0eebc99-9c0b-4ef8-bb6d-6bb9bd380a11';
SELECT * FROM audit_results WHERE bias_detected = true;
SELECT audit_id, audit_date FROM audit_results WHERE ar_content_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM audit_results WHERE audit_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT auditor_id, ar_content_id FROM audit_results WHERE bias_detected = false AND audit_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT COUNT(audit_id) AS total_audits, AVG(CAST(audit_id AS INT)) AS avg_audit_id FROM audit_results GROUP BY bias_detected ORDER BY total_audits DESC;
SELECT * FROM audits_of_ar_content;
SELECT audit_id, audit_date FROM audits_of_ar_content;
SELECT auditor_name, detected_biases FROM audits_of_ar_content;
SELECT ar_content_id, audit_date, auditor_name FROM audits_of_ar_content;
SELECT audit_id, ar_content_id, audit_date, auditor_name, detected_biases FROM audits_of_ar_content;
SELECT * FROM audits_of_ar_content WHERE audit_date >= '2022-01-01' AND audit_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT auditor_name, COUNT(*) AS audit_count FROM audits_of_ar_content GROUP BY auditor_name ORDER BY audit_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM audits_of_ar_content WHERE detected_biases LIKE '%political%' ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT ar_content_id, COUNT(*) AS num_audits FROM audits_of_ar_content GROUP BY ar_content_id HAVING num_audits > 3 ORDER BY num_audits DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT auditor_name FROM audits_of_ar_content WHERE LENGTH(auditor_name) > 10 ORDER BY auditor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM audits WHERE id = 1;
SELECT auditor_name, audit_result FROM audits WHERE audit_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT ar_content_id, content_name, ar_platform FROM ar_content WHERE ar_platform = 'Unity' ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT name, expertise_area FROM auditors WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM audits JOIN auditors ON audits.auditor_name = auditors.name;
SELECT * FROM audits WHERE audit_result = 'Passed' ORDER BY audit_date DESC, auditor_name ASC

SELECT ar_content.content_name, ar_content.creator_name, auditors.name AS auditor_name FROM ar_content LEFT JOIN audits ON ar_content.id = audits.ar_content_id LEFT JOIN auditors ON audits.auditor_id = auditors.id WHERE audits.audit_result = 'Failed'

SELECT ar_content.content_name, ar_content.ar_platform, auditors.expertise_area FROM ar_content JOIN audits ON ar_content.id = audits.ar_content_id JOIN auditors ON audits.auditor_id = auditors.id WHERE audits.audit_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT auditors.name AS auditor_name, COUNT(audits.id) AS audit_count FROM auditors LEFT JOIN audits ON auditors.id = audits.auditor_id GROUP BY auditors.name ORDER BY audit_count DESC

SELECT audits.audit_date, ar_content.content_name, auditors.name AS auditor_name FROM audits JOIN ar_content ON audits.ar_content_id = ar_content.id JOIN auditors ON audits.auditor_id = auditors.id WHERE audits.audit_result = 'Pending' ORDER BY audits.audit_date ASC
SELECT * FROM ethical_audit_ar_content;
SELECT auditor_name, audit_date FROM ethical_audit_ar_content ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM bias_identification WHERE bias_description LIKE '%discrimination%';
SELECT audit_id, feedback_text FROM auditor_feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT DISTINCT audit_id FROM bias_correction ORDER BY correction_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ethical_audit_ar_content ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT auditor_name, audit_date FROM ethical_audit_ar_content WHERE content_id = 10;
SELECT COUNT(audit_id) AS total_audits FROM ethical_audit_ar_content;
SELECT audit_id, COUNT(*) AS total_corrections FROM bias_correction GROUP BY audit_id HAVING total_corrections > 1;

SELECT auditors.auditor_name, feedback.feed_date, feedback.feedback_text FROM auditor_feedback AS feedback INNER JOIN ethical_audit_ar_content AS auditors ON feedback.audit_id = auditors.audit_id ORDER BY feedback.feed_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM audits_table;
SELECT audit_name, audit_date FROM audits_table WHERE auditor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT content_name, content_type FROM content_table ORDER BY content_type DESC;
SELECT bias_description FROM bias_table WHERE bias_type = 'Racial Bias' ORDER BY bias_id ASC;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_specialization FROM researchers_table WHERE researcher_specialization = 'AI Ethics';
SELECT * FROM audits_table;
SELECT audit_name, auditor_name FROM audits_table ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT content_name, content_type FROM content_table WHERE content_owner='John Doe';
SELECT content_name, content_type, bias_type FROM content_table JOIN bias_table ON content_table.content_id = bias_table.content_id;
SELECT audit_name, violation_description FROM audits_table JOIN violations_table ON audits_table.audit_id = violations_table.audit_id WHERE resolution_status='Pending';
